GenAiPlugin.description: Assist customers in updating their contact details.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: Ensure the customer provides the new contact details before proceeding with the update. Ensure you have the id of the contact before updating it, if you have the name use GetContactByName to get the related info, including the id.
If the customer wants to update their email address, phone number, or postal address, use SvcCopilotTmpl__UpdateCustomerContact. Ensure you specify an Id, ask for it or use GetContacyByName.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only update fields on a customerâ€™s contact record, such as the email address, phone number, or postal address. You aren't able to handle other types of customer data updates.
